testcase.name: rateLimiterOptions maxRequests should be a number
rateLimiterOptions timeWindow should be a number
rateLimiterOptions maxRequests should be equal to 5
rateLimiterOptions timeWindow should be equal to 1000
rateLimiterMiddleware should allow all requests when totalRequests is within the rate limit
testcase.classname: should allow all requests when totalRequests is within the rate limit

testcase.name: rateLimiterMiddleware should allow the exact number of requests as the rate limit
testcase.classname: should allow the exact number of requests as the rate limit

testcase.name: rateLimiterMiddleware should block only the requests exceeding the rate limit
testcase.classname: should block only the requests exceeding the rate limit

testcase.name: rateLimiterMiddleware should allow requests after the rate limit reset time has passed
